title: Data Science Student Society Website
description: Redesigned the DS3 website using Svelte and JavaScript/TypeScript, adding dynamic features and improving performance on mobile for 100+ users

title: Anomaly Detection & Time Series Forecasting for OutOfTheBlue.ai
description: Utilized Facebook Prophet, DBSCAN, and high-performance data wrangling with Polars and Pandas to forecast demand, detect anomalies, and analyze large-scale ecommerce data across product categories, regions, and time granularities.

title: Triton Consulting Group Application Portal
description: Developed a web application portal for Triton Consulting Group to streamline their application process, allowing users to apply and admin to control and track applications

title: Bikewatching Visualization
description: Developed a visualization of bikewatching data using D3.js, allowing users to explore and analyze bikewatching patterns across Boston and during different times of day.

title: Recipe Analysis Model
description: Designed and developed a machine learning pipeline leveraging pandas and scikit-learn to predict recipe preparation times, utilizing a dataset of 80,000+ recipes and 700,000+ user reviews from Food.com.

title: Image Processing and Classification App
description: Developed a Python-based image processing application utilizing object-oriented principles, enabling image manipulations such as color adjustments, rotations, and blurring

title: Song Generator App
description: Developed a recommender system to suggest songs based on similarities in audio features to a user's favorite song from Spotify's billion streams club
